original: 啟稟大人，屬下已遣人對<color=#bceea7>$city1</color>進行強徵完成，增加了<color=#bceea7>$num1</color>名兵役人口！
text: Master Qi, his subordinates have sent people to complete the forced conscription of <color=#bceea7>$city1</color>, and increase the number of military service populations of <color=#bceea7>$num1</color>!
